article_text:
1:22

Voices on Obama's Hiroshima Visit

Barack Obama is set to go to Hiroshima, the first sitting U.S. president to visit the site where the U.S. dropped an atomic bomb at the end of World War II. Here are some voices on the historic visit. Photo: Getty

article_metadata.description: Opinion Journal’s Mary Kissel and chess grandmaster Garry Kasparov on Obama’s foreign policy legacy. Plus, Iran deal politicking, Yemen’s terror haven, ObamaCare in court and California’s policing for

og.description: Opinion Journal’s Mary Kissel and chess grandmaster Garry Kasparov on Obama’s foreign policy legacy. Plus, Iran deal politicking, Yemen’s terror haven, ObamaCare in court and California’s policing for profit.
og.title: Opinion Journal: The World in Disarray
